General.Name: Beijing Urban Rural Commercial Group Co Ltd
General.Description: FESCO Group Co., Ltd. operates department stores and supermarkets. It offers clothing, food, and daily use products. The company was formerly known as Beijing Urban-Rural Commercial (Group) Co.,Ltd. FESCO Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No.23 A, Fuxing Road, Beijing, China, 100036

5.Name: Ms. Hong  Chen
